item.title: Don’t Fall for it: How to Spot and Avoid CRA Scams
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
Introduction: The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is responsible for collecting taxes and administering tax laws, but unfortunately, scammers often use the CRA’s name and reputation to trick people into giving away their money or personal information. These scams can take many forms, from fake phone calls to phishing emails. In this blog post, we’ll explore […]

The post Don’t Fall for it: How to Spot and Avoid CRA Scams appeared first on Immigrants101.

item.title: Beware of Amazon Scams: How to Protect Yourself
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
Amazon is one of the most popular and convenient online shopping platforms, but it is not immune to scams. From fake product listings to phishing scams, there are many ways that thieves try to trick shoppers into giving away their money or personal information. In this blog post, we’ll explore some of the most common […]

The post Beware of Amazon Scams: How to Protect Yourself appeared first on Immigrants101.

item.title: Letter of explanation CIC
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
A letter of explanation is a document that provides additional information or clarification to the Canadian Immigration and Citizenship (CIC) regarding an aspect of an individual’s application. This letter can be used to explain any discrepancies or inconsistencies in the application, such as gaps in employment or changes in address. It can also be used […]

The post Letter of explanation CIC appeared first on Immigrants101.

item.title: How to Avoid Scams on Walmart Canada
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
Walmart Canada is a popular retail chain that offers a wide range of products at competitive prices. However, like any other online shopping platform, it is not immune to scams. From fake deals to phishing scams, there are various ways that scammers can trick shoppers into giving away their money or personal information. In this […]

The post How to Avoid Scams on Walmart Canada appeared first on Immigrants101.

item.title: Finding a job as international student
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
Finding a job as an international student can be challenging, but there are several strategies that can help increase your chances of success. Some of these strategies include: Networking: Networking is key to finding job opportunities as an international student. Reach out to professors, alumni, and other professionals in your field of study to learn […]

item.title: Express Entry Proof of funds
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
Introduction When applying for Canada’s Express Entry program, one of the requirements is to show that you have enough funds to support yourself and your family during your first few months in Canada. This is known as proof of funds (for express entry). What is express entry program Canada’s Express Entry program is a way […]

item.title: Debt consolidation loans
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
Debt consolidation loans can be a good option for people who are struggling to manage multiple debts with different interest rates and monthly payments. By consolidating your debts into a single loan with a lower interest rate and a single monthly payment, you may be able to simplify your debt repayment and potentially save money […]

The post Debt consolidation loans appeared first on Immigrants101.

item.title: Sample invitation letter for super visa
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
The super visa is a type of visitor visa that allows parents and grandparents of Canadian citizens or permanent residents to visit Canada for up to two years at a time. In this post, I will share an overview and sample invitation letter for super visa. The super visa is a multiple-entry visa, which means […]

The post Sample invitation letter for super visa appeared first on Immigrants101.

item.title: BMO NewStart program
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
The BMO NewStart program is a financial assistance program offered by the Bank of Montreal (BMO) to help individuals who are experiencing financial hardship due to unforeseen circumstances, such as job loss, illness, or natural disasters. The program provides a range of support services and financial assistance to help individuals get back on their feet, […]

The post BMO NewStart program appeared first on Immigrants101.

item.title: Transfer money from Canada to India
item.dc:creator: Yadwinder - Immigrants101
item.description:
There are several ways to send money from Canada to India, including bank-to-bank transfers, online money transfer services, and mobile money transfer apps. Here are some things to consider when choosing a method: Fees Compare the fees charged by different banks and money transfer services to find the option that offers the best value. Some […]
